meanings.definition: Make a continuous low humming sound.
meanings.sent1: The bees were yirring around the flowers.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the machine yirring in the background.
meanings.sent3: The yirring of the fan put me to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The distant yirring of the train filled the air.
meanings.sent5: The yirring of the cicadas was a soothing lullaby.

meanings.sent1: The yirring of the refrigerator was comforting at night.
meanings.sent2: The yirring of the distant traffic could be heard faintly.
meanings.sent3: The yirring of the old computer was oddly calming.
meanings.sent4: The yirring of the wind through the trees was like a gentle melody.
meanings.sent5: The constant yirring of the air conditioner was a background noise.
